name: Core Warden TD
description:
Core Warden TD is an Tower Defense game using magical elemental towers to defend against the raging demon hordes, mix magical elements to trigger elemental reactions against the demons.

Current Features -----
  • Build and Upgrades 4 Different towers.
  • 6 Different levels (consist of Snow and Forest region, for now..).
  • 5 Different type of enemies.
  • 6 Different Elements.
  • 15 Different Elemental Reactions to use against enemies.
Credits -----
  • Game developed by : @GreenVeee
  • Music composed by : @Briskled
-------------------------------------------------------
